subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|木|更|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – a type of plant.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: {{rfe|zh|Schuessler (2007) only lists “strong” as being related to {{och-l|強|id=1|strong}}. Are all these senses related?}}
